sig_info: Once per fight when either Hulk or his Opponent hits 20% Health remaining the crowd judges that fighter's performance. If they feel they fought well they give a Thumbs Up, if they feel they fought poorly a Thumbs Down. Each judgement grants Hulk a Passive effect.
Thumbs Up: Regenerate 120.8 to 362.26 Health on Hulk over 10 seconds.
Thumbs Down: +39.6 to 87.82 Attack for the rest of the fight.
